name: Tremaine Games (2D)
description:
Simple Launcher for All Completed Java 2D Games by Creator

Just 4 Fun - Graphics aren't the best and probably quite kiddy for most of yall (LOL done by me at 13 years old)

Games Include:

1) Blood Shot
2) Space Invaders
3) Survive (Player vs Zombie Survival Game With 2D Building)
4) Switch (Car Game)
5) Flip (Memory Game)

Windows only (Setup File, Plug and Play)

Leave any comments down below but these projects may not be updated in future :)

Have Fun!
